text: Valderrama may refer to: ==People== * Valderrama (surname) ==Places== * Valderrama, Antique, a municipality in the Philippines ==Other uses== *Valderrama Golf Club in Spain. *Balderrama, the name of a zamba by Castilla and Leguizamón, which appears, interpreted by Mercedes Sosa, in the soundtrack of the second part of the Che film.
title: Valderrama
